name: Eyes of Fear (itch)
description:
Small attempt at a horror game for the Game Endevor discord only jam. Here is a link if you want to join us. https://discord.gg/w7qh74M

Code and most art by: Ivan Martin

Music by: Joaquin Vintamilla
